title: The default value set in a list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in a list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. Steps to reproduce: 1. New a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. 5.
OB: The default value is not retained in the list box of the report parameter after modifying the default value. Upon reopening the Edit Parameter dialog, the modified default value is not displayed correctly.
EB: The default value 'aaa' should be retained in the list box of the report parameter after modifying the default value. Upon reopening the Edit Parameter dialog, the modified default value should be displayed correctly.
SR: 1. New a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. The default value in the list box should now be 'aaa'.
